name: Let's Fight Ghost
original_name: คู่ไฟท์ไฝว้ผี
overview: A cohabitation comedy about a ghost of a high school girl who has been dead for 5 years and an exorcist college boy with the ability to see and hear ghosts. What he’s discovered over the years is that he can touch them and fight them off, so when he’s in need of a part-time job and can’t find one that pays well enough, he starts putting ads online as an exorcist for hire. His ad: “Will face off with your ghosts. Chances of winning: virgin ghosts 80%, bachelor ghosts 40%, child ghosts 97%, the rest 50%.” One night he goes out on the job and faces off with a schoolgirl ghost, and during the fight, they accidentally kiss and sparks fly."

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Med student Off takes a ghost-catching side gig. The mysterious Jeen remembers parts of her past after an unexpected encounter.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Desperate to treat her amnesia, Jeen makes an ask. Off pushes back, but the two must find a way to work together to defeat a spirit.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After another kiss fails to trigger Jeen's memory, a guilty Off lets her stay with him. Meanwhile, an obsessed ghost targets those who insult his idol.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jeen angers Off when she enters his private storage room. The ghost of a young monk needs the help of Junior and Off: He wants to find his body.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A painful flashback makes Off consider eye surgery. Junior and Leng want Off to join their ghost-busting club, so they lure him in using Numwan.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The police investigate a professor after a student's death. When Numwan is harmed by a ghost during a camping trip, Off accuses Jeen of hurting her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Jeen has a vision of an important day, Off's father disappears without a trace, and the club helps a mother whose daughter is possessed by a ghost.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A heart-to-heart reveals Jeen's and Off's true feelings. Later, Junior and Leng confront Off about Jeen then hunt down ghosts in an abandoned factory.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mon struggles with a secret while Off learns tragic news. The Sok-Lek crew encounters a ghost who's convinced that Leng has wronged her.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Dr. Jade uses his evil powers on Jeen. Mon grows concerned that Off's life is in danger and tries to ward off a wandering spirit.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Numwan falls under Dr. Jade's spell. With Off reeling from heartbreak, the club deals with a ghostly rocker. Jeen's memory starts to come back.
